FIPS code |blank_info = 06-36546 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info =
1660799 }} 'Inglewood' is a city in southwestern Los Angeles County, California,
southwest of downtown Los Angeles. It was incorporated on February 14, 1908. Its population stood at 109,673 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The city is in the South Bay region of the greater Los Angeles area. [http://www.chooselacounty.com/images/doingbusiness/la-county-
map.jpg Choose LA County ]
